page.title: 13AN INTERVIEW
page.content:
I was asked to interview someone.So I decided to interview Miss Barbara Bateson.She told me that she likes living in the country and near the town.And her house is quite new.She was born in her grandmothers house.Her hobby is gardening and she has two people in her family her mother and herself.She has lived in the village for 62 years.Her milk was collected jug from Trevispian Vean farm.She likes the main road but said the estate was an eyesore and was not well planned.She is now retired from a job in local government.
By KARINA ROBERTS AND JOANNE WILLS
